title: Let us destroy Caitlyn's traps
body: Every other character can have their traps destroyed, hell even Teemo's shrooms are destroyable. Yet Cait's traps are just...there until you step in them or they despawn (do they despawn?), the only counterplay being...step in them if she's not nearby to get rid of them so she doesn't hit you or walk around them (if you can).

replies.body:
Do you want cait traps to be invisible?

I think that would be a buff.
yeah except theres one difference between cait traps and the other traps, they are not invisible
I mean, sure, but make them invisible, like Teemos R/Jhins trap/Nidas trap, it will be much more funny.
I just want them to last 1/4th the time under turret like EVERYTHING else.

That's like saying you want an assassin that can't kill the enemy and always will leave the enemy at 1 hp, doesn't matter what they do.
It is contradicting her playstyle.

________________

Caitlyn is supposed to be the prime sieging marksman, her traps are supposed to zone enemies so she can safely attack the enemy tower. It is also the very reason why they buffed her back then by allowing her to headshot turrets. 

Discouraging Caitlyn to use her traps nearby towers by cutting their duration by such a large portion makes no sense, since this is actually the situation she should be encouraged to use them in.
Cait's traps are visible and only last 30-50 seconds.
